column1:
KAB Community Value List 

Welcome to the KAB Community Value List, a player-driven and consistently updated guide to item values in KAB.
This value list is NOT official, but we strive to make it as accurate and reliable as possible by gathering data from players, admins, and the game owner.

Our values are based on trends similar to KAT values, ensuring a familiar system for trading. 
Since the in-game economy is constantly shifting, we update our values weekly or bi-weekly to reflect market demand, rarity, and player feedback.

We hope that this list either becomes the official value list for KAB or serves as a strong foundation for an official system in the future.

Click the VALUES page for full list

column3: Feel free to DM if you have any questions
